p: OPV cessation will ultimately stop the creation of new long-term excretors, but it will take time for the chronic excretors that exist at the time of OPV cessation to stop excreting. Countries and the GPEI will need to recognize that in a world without high levels of population immunity to transmission derived from use of LPVs, iVDPVs will represent an important potential source for re-introduction of poliovirus that requires active risk management.
